briefTitle: Oncotype DX in BRCA-mutated Breast Cancer Patients: Our Experience. A Retrospective Observational Monocentric Study
officialTitle: Oncotype DX in BRCA-mutated Breast Cancer Patients: Our Experience. A Retrospective Observational Monocentric Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Oncotype DX assay and RS® in participants.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age at diagnosis at least 18 years
* Women who underwent breast surgery in OSR
* Patients with ER-positive, HER2-unamplified early-stage BC who underwent the Oncotype DX assay, according to the standard of care.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Male
* ER negative or HER2 amplified disease
* Patient s who did not undergo breast surgery in OSR
* Patient s who did not undergo the Oncotype Dx assay
